languages.text: "Мои... техносоратники..." {n}Голос едва слышен. Кажется, каждое слово дается выжившему с трудом.{/n} "Дух машины... неужели {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g}... оставил нас? Кьява Гамма пала... в пасть Извечного врага..."

traits.locale_text: "Мои... братья..." {n}Голос едва слышен. Кажется, каждое слово дается выжившему с трудом.{/n} "Дух машины... неужели Омниссия... оставил нас? Кьява Гамма пала... в пасть Извечного врага..."

languages.text: "My... comrades..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."
languages.original_text: "Мои... техносоратники..." {n}Голос едва слышен. Кажется, каждое слово дается выжившему с трудом.{/n} "Дух машины... неужели {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g}... оставил нас? Кьява Гамма пала... в пасть Извечного врага..."

traits.locale_text: "My... brothers..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the Omnissiah truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

"My... brothers..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

"My... comrades..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

"My... comrades..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

languages.text: “是我的……同胞们……”{n}你几乎听不清他的声音。仿佛他每说一个字，都要付出巨大的努力。{/n}“机魂啊……{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}真的……抛弃了我们吗？基亚瓦伽马星……已经……落入了……永恒宿敌的巨口之中……”
languages.original_text: "My... comrades..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

traits.locale_text: “是我的……同胞们……”{n}你几乎听不清他的声音。仿佛他每说一个字，都要付出巨大的努力。{/n}“机魂啊……{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}真的……抛弃了我们吗？基亚瓦伽马星……已经……落入了……永恒宿敌的巨口之中……”

languages.text: «Mis... camaradas». {n}Su voz es apenas un susurro. Parece que le cueste un esfuerzo horrendo pronunciar cada palabra.{/n} «Espíritu máquina... ¿nos ha abandonado... realmente... el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? Kiava Gamma ha caído... en las fauces del Enemigo Eterno...».
languages.original_text: "My... comrades..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

traits.locale_text: «Mis... camaradas». {n}Su voz es apenas un susurro. Parece que le cueste un esfuerzo horrendo pronunciar cada palabra.{/n} «Espíritu máquina... ¿nos ha abandonado... realmente... el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? Kiava Gamma ha caído... en las fauces del Enemigo Eterno...».

languages.text: 「我が…同胞…」{n}男の声はほとんど聞き取れない。男は言葉をひとつ絞り出すたびに、かなりの力を使っているようだ。{/n}「機械精霊…{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}は、本当に…我々を、見捨てて…？キアヴァ・ガンマは、堕ちた…永遠の敵の、マウの中へ…」
languages.original_text: "My... comrades..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

traits.locale_text: 「我が…同胞…」{n}男の声はほとんど聞き取れない。男は言葉をひとつ絞り出すたびに、かなりの力を使っているようだ。{/n}「機械精霊…{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}は、本当に…我々を、見捨てて…？キアヴァ・ガンマは、堕ちた…永遠の敵の、マウの中へ…」

languages.text: "Meine ... Kameraden ..." {n}Seine Stimme ist kaum vernehmbar. Jedes Wort scheint ihn große Anstrengung zu kosten.{/n} "Maschinengeist ... hat der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} uns ... wirklich verlassen? Kiava Gamma ist gefallen ... in den Schlund des Ewigen Feindes ..."
languages.original_text: "My... comrades..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

traits.locale_text: "Meine ... Kameraden ..." {n}Seine Stimme ist kaum vernehmbar. Jedes Wort scheint ihn große Anstrengung zu kosten.{/n} "Maschinengeist ... hat der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} uns ... wirklich verlassen? Kiava Gamma ist gefallen ... in den Schlund des Ewigen Feindes ..."

languages.text: « Mes... camarades... » {n}dit-il d'une voix à peine audible. Chaque mot sembler lui demander un effort considérable.{/n} « Esprit de la machine... l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} nous a-t-il vraiment... abandonnés ? Kiava Gamma est tombée... dans la gueule de l'Ennemi Éternel... »
languages.original_text: "My... comrades..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

traits.locale_text: « Mes... camarades... » {n}dit-il d'une voix à peine audible. Chaque mot sembler lui demander un effort considérable.{/n} « Esprit de la machine... l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} nous a-t-il vraiment... abandonnés ? Kiava Gamma est tombée... dans la gueule de l'Ennemi Éternel... »

languages.text: "Yoldaşlarım..." {n}Sesi zar zor çıkıyor. Sarf ettiği her kelimede sanki işkence çekiyor.{/n} "Makine ruhu... {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} gerçekten... Bizi terk mi etti? Kiava Gama... Ebedî Düşman'ın ağına kapıldı..."
languages.original_text: "My... comrades..." {n}His voice is barely audible. It seems each word takes the man a great deal of effort.{/n} "Machine spirit... has the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} truly... abandoned us? Kiava Gamma has fallen... into the maw of the Eternal Enemy..."

traits.locale_text: "Yoldaşlarım..." {n}Sesi zar zor çıkıyor. Sarf ettiği her kelime işkence gibi geliyor sanki.{/n} "Makine ruhu... {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} gerçekten... Bizi terk mi etti? Kiava Gama... Ebedî Düşman'ın ağına kapıldı..."
